objects.specification: A seamless square floor base spanning six meters on each side, crafted with a smooth matte surface in a warm neutral tone. The floor features a subtle texture for gentle traction, creating a clean and inviting foundation that complements the booth’s overall warm color scheme.

Each wall panel rises three meters high and extends the full length of the booth’s side, finished in a crisp off-white matte paint. The walls have clean sharp edges and a uniform smooth surface, providing a neutral backdrop that enhances the display elements while maintaining an open and welcoming feel.

The walls have clean sharp edges and a uniform smooth surface, providing a neutral backdrop that enhances the display elements while maintaining an open and welcoming feel.

The walls have clean sharp edges and a uniform smooth surface, providing a neutral backdrop that enhances the display elements while maintaining an open and welcoming feel.

A reception desk defined by simple rectangular forms and clean lines, with a gently finished wood‐tone surface in a warm sandy hue. The desk has smooth edges, a subtle grain texture, and a sturdy plinth base that invites attendees for a friendly greeting.

A tall visitor stool featuring a slender metal frame supporting a softly upholstered seat in a rich earthy brown tone. The stool has narrow legs, a circular seat pad with gentle cushioning, and a minimalist silhouette that offers comfortable seating without visual clutter.

A tall visitor stool featuring a slender metal frame supporting a softly upholstered seat in a rich earthy brown tone. The stool has narrow legs, a circular seat pad with gentle cushioning, and a minimalist silhouette that offers comfortable seating without visual clutter.

A vertical display stand with a flat top surface supported by a slim upright column, rendered in a bright orange accent color. The stand’s smooth glossy finish and slender proportions create a modern platform for showcasing products or promotional materials along the booth walls.

A vertical hanging banner in a vivid sky-blue hue, crafted from lightweight fabric with a smooth matte finish. Each banner features crisp straight edges and a slender profile, presenting bold color continuity that draws attention against the neutral back wall.

A pendant light with an elegant slim cylindrical body suspended by a fine cord, finished in soft buttery yellow. The fixture emits a warm ambient glow, with a smooth exterior and minimalistic form that adds subtle illumination above the booth space.

A round plant pot with gently curved sides and a matte neutral finish, housing lush green foliage composed of broad leaves. The pot has a simple cylindrical silhouette and the vibrant natural tones of the plant introduce organic warmth to the booth environment.

A glossy red helium balloon with a perfectly spherical shape, featuring a smooth reflective surface and a subtle sheen that catches light. The balloon floats gently above the floor, adding a playful vibrant accent.
